code: import React from'react';import{formatPrice}from'../../untils/index';import{useDispatch}from'react-redux';import{AddToCart,DeleteToCart,DeleteQtyProduct}from'../../actions/CartAction';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Product(props){const{product}=props;const dispatch=useDispatch();function handleDeleteProduct(product){const action=DeleteToCart(product);dispatch(action);}function handleAddProduct(product){const action=AddToCart(product);dispatch(action);}function handleProductOut(product){const action=DeleteQtyProduct(product);dispatch(action);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shopping-cart-list-product",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shopping-cart-list-product-block",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"shopping-cart-list-product-block-left",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:product.image})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shopping-cart-list-product-block-right",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-name",children:product.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"product-price",children:formatPrice(product.salePrice)})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shopping-cart-list-product-bottom",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("ul",{className:"button-event",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleDeleteProduct(product),children:"-"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{children:product.qty}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("li",{onClick:()=>handleAddProduct(product),children:"+"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"delete-product",onClick:()=>handleProductOut(product),children:" X\xF3a kh\u1ECFi gi\u1ECF h\xE0ng "})]})]})});}export default Product;
